sentences.sentence: The art world often nurtures its 1)enfants terribles. After all, rule breakers sell paintings.
sentences.translation: 艺术界往往是培育“坏孩子”的温床，毕竟，敢于破规犯戒的人才能使其艺术作品有卖点。

sentences.sentence: Le pere des mes enfants (" the Father of My Children ") belongs to the genre of the country house movie, French division.
sentences.translation: Le pere des mes enfants(暂译《我孩子的父亲》“ the Father of My Children ”)属于法国乡村类型电影。
